titleStmt.title: The ORIGINAL Baker's Chocolate Brownie Recipe

publicationStmt.publisher: THE STORIED RECIPE ON THE SEASONED PRO

body.head: The ORIGINAL Baker's Chocolate Brownie Recipe

div.head: INGREDIENTS
div.list: 4 oz (1 box) unsweetened chocolate ⅔ cup butter 1 ⅓ cup all purpose flour 1 teaspoon baking powder ½ teaspoon salt 4 eggs 2 cups white sugar 2 teaspoon vanilla

div.head: DIRECTIONS
div.list: Preheat oven to 350. Grease a 9×13″ pan with butter or cooking spray. Make sure oven rack is in the middle of the oven. In small microwave safe bowl, melt butter and chocolate in microwave (or over double boiler). Allow to cool slightly. Measure flour, salt, and baking powder into another small bowl. In larger mixing bowl, beat eggs thoroughly. A whisk is fine. Gradually add sugar. Blend chocolate mixture and vanilla into egg/sugar mixture. Add flour mixture, stir well. Spread in the greased 9×13″ pan and bake for 25-30 minutes. Cool and cut into 24 squares.
